channel.title: CORS on Abdelrhman Allam
channel.description: Recent content in CORS on Abdelrhman Allam

item.title: Cross-Origin Resource Sharing
item.description: In this section, we will explain what cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) is, describe some common examples of cross-origin resource sharing based attacks, and discuss how to protect against these attacks. References Bug Bounty Bootcamp: The Guide to Finding and Reporting Web Vulnerabilities What is CORS cross-origin resource sharing Cross-Origin Resource Sharing CORS MDN CORS vulnerability CORS Misconfiguration CORS - Misconfigurations & Bypass PayloadsAllTheThings/README.md at master Â· swisskyrepo/PayloadsAllTheThings Exploiting Misconfigured CORS (Cross Origin Resource Sharing)
